entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 PM PST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 6:56 PM PST Monday 09 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: N 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Fog dissipating late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 09 January 2023
